column2: parking is not going to be walk up
column3: so unless you live/work in the area
column4: expect to walk short distance. Food was good but not spectacular. Don't think it's intended to be
column5: but noodles were tasty. Ambiance is pretty nice
column7: and seems a bit tight. Tables therefore a little small too. Cute little welcome they yell out for every customer arriving. Attentive friendly service.
